events.event_purpose: A datathon to demonstrate Smart City ideas using City of Winnipeg Open Data datasets.

events.event_name: Hackathon: contributions of data on deforestations and land degradation
events.event_purpose: By doing this hackathon, I hope to realize a local deforestation map and registering land degradations areas due to disasters, which can help locals students and researchers to find that datas disponibility

events.event_name: HerData, HerFuture: Open Data Day 2026 Datathon
events.event_purpose: To empower women in data science and AI to collaboratively use open data to develop innovative, data-driven solutions addressing real-world social and economic challenges.
events.organisers: Women in. Data Science and AI Zambia

events.event_purpose: Open Data Hackathon 2026 is designed to turn Hudson Valley data into action with AI. Government agencies: pitch their challenges, get innovative solutions, hire emerging talent. Tech community: solve real problems, build your portfolio, launch careers—or startups. Professionals work alongside students. Hi-tech meets low-tech. One day of collaboration that creates implementable civic innovation. All skill levels welcome.

events.event_name: Les données ouvertes pour améliorer l’accès à l’eau potable dans la commune de Sinendé
events.event_purpose: Permettre aux citoyens et acteurs locaux d’analyser et d’utiliser les données ouvertes sur l’eau potable afin d’identifier les insuffisances et formuler des recommandations communautaires basées sur des preuves.
events.organisers: SU WUSUA DAA ONG, email: suwusuadaa@gmail.com

events.event_purpose: To open maps data for local cities

events.event_name: Open Data for Climate Action: Insights for Students
events.event_purpose: To build students’ understanding of open data and climate change, strengthen data literacy skills, and empower participants to access, analyze, and use open climate data to identify local environmental challenges and propose data-driven solutions for climate action

events.event_name: Open Data for Climate Change Action
events.event_purpose: Residents can identify climate risks in Ikosi-Ketu using data rather than assumptions by encouraging participants to develop data-informed ideas or actions relevant to Ikosi-Ketu.

events.event_name: Open Data for Transparent Governance & Public Services
events.event_purpose: We hope to empower citizens, CSOs, and media in Taraba State to use open data to track public spending, improve service delivery, and strengthen transparency and accountability in governance.
events.organisers: Name of Organisation: Initiative for Community and Human Development in Taraba (ICHD); Contact Email: ichd4u@gmail.com
events.place: The event will take place in Jalingo, Taraba State Capital, Northeast Nigeria.

events.event_name: Unlocking the Power of Open Data for Local Impact
events.event_purpose: We want to show how open data can help people and communities in Akwa Ibom make smarter decisions, solve local problems, and create opportunities for growth and positive change.

events.event_name: “¿Dónde quedó mi obra?” Taller para vigilar el presupuesto y las obras públicas desde tu colonia
events.event_purpose: Fortalecer la supervisión ciudadana mediante la capacitación en presupuesto y obras públicas, usando datos abiertos y herramientas tecnológicas para rastrear proyectos, comprender el uso de recursos y reportar irregularidades de forma informada.
events.organisers: Concejalía de la Alcaldía Miguel Hidalgo, movimiento.mh.concejalia@gmail.com
